title.narrative: Comprehensive Emergency response to immediate health and protection needs of vulnerable population of Gaza Strip to mitigate risks and save lives.

description.narrative:
The project aims to respond to the current emergency situation in the Gaza Strip in connection with the events of the Great Return March, which resulted in dozens of martyrs and thousands of injured.
In order to increase the effectiveness of the project idea, partnership with the Central Blood Bank Society (CBBS) and El Wafa Medical Rehab. amp Specialized Surgery Hospital will be implemented in order to provide comprehensive emergency services to trauma and non trauma cases in the field and in health facilities. Where it is estimated that 18074 cases will benefited from the project (42% of them are female).
The project will supply UHWC health facilities, CBBS and Al Wafa rehabilitation hospital with needed medication, medical disposable, lab reagents, fuel, assistive devices and equipment in order to ensure the continuation of the provision of emergency health services to the trauma and non trauma cases from men , women, youth and children at all Gaza Strip governates through providing first aid services to the injured in the field and transporting some of them by ambulances to Al-Awda Hospital or the nearest UHWC health centers to providing them with medical services in the emergency departments.
Whereas the project will contribute in conducting surgical operations to needed cases and providing needed cases with blood units through the Blood Bank Society and referring the cases required rehabilitation to Al Wafa rehabilitation Hospital.
It is worth to mention that all the provided emergency services to trauma (causalities) cases will be provided free of charge in all stages.
The project also will include building the capacity of medical staff from UHWC facilities, CBBS and Al Wafa rehabilitation hospital through organizing training course for 30 hours in emergency response.
To summarize, the project aims to respond to immediate health and protection needs in the Gaza Strip through the deployment of UHWC medical team in the field and the provision of critical and life-saving drugs, consumables including safe collection, storage and transportation of blood by CBBS. In addition to provision of medical rehabilitation services and assistive devices by Al Wafa Rehabilitation Hospital.
Not to mention that all trauma cases will be documented by using HC unified forms.
